last_commit_message: feat: Add cache IDs for Composer and Node.js steps to improve caching efficiency

data.pr_title: Adding Template Class and Its Wrapper Funtions
data.pr_desc:
# 🚀 Pull Request Template

## Description

Please include a summary of the change and what issue is fixed or feature is added.

Fixes: # (link issue number if applicable)

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related Plugins or Themes

List any themes/plugins affected.

## Screenshots (if UI changes)

_Please attach screenshots/gifs if relevant._

## Checklist

- [ ] I have tested the code on my local WordPress.
- [ ] I have followed WordPress PHPCS rules.
- [ ] I have added tests or explained why not applicable.
- [ ] My code follows the plugin’s coding style.

---

Thanks for contributing to **WiseSync**! ❤️
commits: feat: Add constructor and create_template method to Sync_Template class
feat: Update caching keys for Composer and NPM to include target branch and month
feat: Update build-and-deploy workflow to restrict linting to master branch and enhance PHPCS reporting in PR workflow
feat: Simplify PHPCS workflow by removing caching and push count logic, and enhance report output
fix: Update PR environment link workflow to use head branch for environment URL determination
feat: Enhance PR environment link workflow with detailed environment info and improved comment formatting
fix: Correct typos in Sync_Template class documentation
refactor: Rename build_and_deploy job to build_deploy_and_release and streamline release condition checks
feat: Add developer settings functionality for staging and development environments
feat: Refactor PR data generation to use Python script for improved error handling and flexibility
feat: Add cache IDs for Composer and Node.js steps to improve caching efficiency
